author: Alex Norcia, Maxwell Strachan
title: Uber and Lyft Drivers Are Already Going Hungry
description: Nearly half of drivers in the Tri-state area have requested help getting food since the coronavirus outbreak. "I have three days' worth of food left," one said.
content:
Ali considered spending the last of his money on vegetables. But he went with the rice instead. The rice, he reasoned, could hold him over for a bit longer. When that's gone, he doesn't know where his next meal will come from, let alone his next paycheck. 
"… [+5264 chars]
